design.Description: sequence of real-time affect regulation goals

mod1.Description: type of first real-time scan run on the participant

mod2.Description: type of second real-time scan run on the participant

sham_rpt.Description: Subj self-report of sham modulate run id (numerical forced choice)

sham_cnf.Description: Confidence of subject in sham detection (10-point Likert where 1='I don't know' and 10='I'm Certain')

zemg.Description: flag indicating acquisition of zygomaticus facial EMG

error.Description: flag indicating an error in the coding of arousal feedback transmitted to the presentation computer from the real-time computer

Levels.0: logs do not contain erroroneous values
